Name: HF Financial Corp
Description: DELISTED - HF Financial Corp. is a unitary thrift holding company. The Company operates through its principal banking subsidiary Home Federal Bank (the Bank). The Bank is a federally chartered stock savings bank, which provides full-service consumer and commercial business banking, including a range of financial products and services. The Bank attracts deposits from the general public and uses such deposits, together with borrowings and other funds, to originate one- to four-family residential loans, commercial business loans, agriculture loans, consumer loans, multi-family and commercial real estate loans and construction loans. The Bank's consumer direct loan portfolio includes automobile loans, home equity loans, loans secured by deposit accounts and student loans. Effective March 24, 2010, the Bank dissolved its subsidiary, Home Federal Securitization Corp. (HFSC).
